title: Need 7 RP
body: I'm 7 RP off from buying the Augment essence bundle, it makes me feel sad, because I really just want to be worth something, I desperately need this 7 RP, so that I know I have a place in this world. That and I need to it to give you guys money, because I have a box opening addiction.

replies.body:
For this type of request, we'll need you to reach out via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I hope we can help!

Let me know if you have any questions.
